item.author: Author
item.description:
• F|[Menu] Fix config controls: #368 #373 #374;
  • A|[Menu] New Audio config page: #345 #346 #367;
  • F|[Graphics] Headlights in replay: #377;
  • I|[Menu] MahApps.Metro v1.4;
  • F|[Core] Alt tab crash: #376;
  • I|[Physics] Feedback feeling at low speed;
  • I|[Physics] The wheel is autocenter when you enter in game;
  • I|[Graphics] Now the ui is shown: #365;
  • I|Happy new year! :dizzy: :beers:
  • Added
    Menu

item.author: Author
item.description:
• I|[Physics] car log position and rotation;
  • I|[Showroom] postprocessing like ingame;
  • F|[Menu] #366;
  • F|[Controls] #369;
  • F|[Showroom] #372 is not almost completely fixed but works now;
  • I|[Controls] Now the analogic controls can be used with a digital control (like a button or a key);
  • F|[Physics] Sometimes the car fly or is uncontrollable;
  • A|Merry Christmas! :santa: :christmas_tree:;

item.author: Author
item.description:
• I|[Physics] improved cycle;
  • F|[Menu] Solved date/time issue #360;
  • F|[Physics] Now is stopped! #364;
  • A|If you add an option to gRally.ini config file:
[sim]
debugMode = true

the sim starts without the physics and you see where the car is loaded etc... pressing D key the sim starts

item.author: Author
item.description: I|[Physics] configurable cycle from normal and MultiThreaded;

item.author: Author
item.description: I|[Physics] improved cycle; I|Menu management #343; F|Screenshot key K #362; F|[Physics] collisions during replay #361;

item.author: Author
item.description: A|Split times shown ingame. E|Changed codriver audio pacenotes. A|English codriver. A|Codriver choice in menu. E|Pacenotes system. I|Set engine volume at 0.5 and codriver volume at 1.0 to hear better the pacenotes.

item.author: Author
item.description: F|[Graphics] Replay not show car and track. F|[Graphics] Recce not show car and track. A|New console command: PATH_DISABLE and PATH_ENABLE, to disable and re-enable the path calculation (the function that check where is the car, is necessary to detect the distance driven and the pacenotes playing). A|New console command: STATS that shows the current fps stats and save them into output_log.txt file.
